name: Orange Sweet Potatoes
description: Our show-stopping baked orange sweet potatoes make for one vibrant, crowd-pleasing side dish for the holidays and special events.

recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the sweet potatoes
recipeInstructions.text: Place the sweet potatoes in a Dutch oven, and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce the heat. Cover and simmer until the sweet potatoes can easily be pierced with a knife or fork, 25 to 30 minutes. Drain. Preheat your oven to 350Â°F. When the sweet potatoes have cooled enough to handle, peel them and cut into 1/2-inch slices. Arrange the slices in a greased shallow 3-quart baking dish. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.name: Create the glaze
recipeInstructions.text: In a large saucepan, whisk together the brown sugar, cornstarch, salt and cinnamon. Whisk in the orange juice, honey, butter, water and orange zest. Bring everything to a boil. Cook and whisk the orange mixture until thickened, about two minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in the walnuts.

recipeInstructions.name: Assemble and bake
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the orange mixture over the sweet potatoes. Bake, uncovered, until everything is heated through, about 25 minutes.

review.reviewBody: I have made this recipe multiple times. Its become a favorite at our family Thanksgiving meal.
